verses.verse: תְּפִלָּ֗ה <S%H8605><s%> A Prayer לְדָ֫וִ֥ד <S%H1732><s%> of David הַטֵּֽה־ <S%H5186><s%> Bow down יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> O LORD אָזְנְךָ֣ <S%H241><s%> thine ear עֲנֵ֑נִי <S%H6030><s%> hear כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> For עָנִ֖י <S%H6041><s%> me for I [am] poor וְאֶבְי֣וֹן <S%H34><s%> and needy אָֽנִי׃ <S%H589><s%> I

שָֽׁמְרָ֣ה <S%H8104><s%> Preserve נַפְשִׁי֮ <S%H5315><s%> my soul כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> I am a חָסִ֪יד <S%H2623><s%> for I [am] holy אָ֥נִי <S%H589><s%> I הוֹשַׁ֣ע <S%H3467><s%> save עַ֭בְדְּךָ <S%H5650><s%> thy servant אַתָּ֣ה <S%H859><s%> You אֱלֹהַ֑י <S%H430><s%> O thou my God הַבּוֹטֵ֥חַ <S%H982><s%> that trusteth אֵלֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H413><s%> about

חָנֵּ֥נִי <S%H2603><s%> Be merciful אֲדֹנָ֑י <S%H136><s%> unto me O Lord כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for אֵלֶ֥יךָ <S%H413><s%> to אֶ֝קְרָ֗א <S%H7121><s%> for I cry כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַיּֽוֹם׃ <S%H3117><s%> unto thee daily

שַׂ֭מֵּחַ <S%H8055><s%> Rejoice נֶ֣פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> the soul עַבְדֶּ֑ךָ <S%H5650><s%> of thy servant כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for אֵלֶ֥יךָ <S%H413><s%> to אֲ֝דֹנָ֗י <S%H136><s%> for unto thee O Lord נַפְשִׁ֥י <S%H5315><s%> my soul אֶשָּֽׂא׃ <S%H5375><s%> do I lift up

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for אַתָּ֣ה <S%H859><s%> You אֲ֭דֹנָי <S%H136><s%> For thou Lord ט֣וֹב <S%H2896><s%> [art] good וְסַלָּ֑ח <S%H5546><s%> and ready to forgive וְרַב־ <S%H7227><s%> and plenteous חֶ֝֗סֶד <S%H2617><s%> in mercy לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> to all קֹרְאֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H7121><s%> unto all them that call

הַאֲזִ֣ינָה <S%H238><s%> Give ear יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> O LORD תְּפִלָּתִ֑י <S%H8605><s%> unto my prayer וְ֝הַקְשִׁ֗יבָה <S%H7181><s%> and attend בְּק֣וֹל <S%H6963><s%> to the voice תַּחֲנוּנוֹתָֽי׃ <S%H8469><s%> of my supplications
בְּי֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> In the day צָ֭רָתִ֥י <S%H6869><s%> of my trouble אֶקְרָאֶ֗ךָּ <S%H7121><s%> I will call כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for תַעֲנֵֽנִי׃ <S%H6030><s%> upon thee for thou wilt answer

אֵין־ <S%H369><s%> There כָּמ֖וֹךָ <S%H3644><s%> like בָאֱלֹהִ֥ים ׀ <S%H430><s%> Among the gods אֲדֹנָ֗י <S%H136><s%> [there is] none like unto thee O Lord וְאֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> is no כְּֽמַעֲשֶֽׂיךָ׃ <S%H4639><s%> neither [are there any works] like unto thy works

כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> All גּוֹיִ֤ם ׀ <S%H1471><s%> All nations אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> whom עָשִׂ֗יתָ <S%H6213><s%> whom thou hast made יָב֤וֹאוּ ׀ <S%H935><s%> shall come וְיִשְׁתַּחֲו֣וּ <S%H7812><s%> and worship לְפָנֶ֣יךָ <S%H6440><s%> before אֲדֹנָ֑י <S%H136><s%> thee O Lord וִֽיכַבְּד֣וּ <S%H3513><s%> and shall glorify לִשְׁמֶֽךָ׃ <S%H8034><s%> thy name

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for גָד֣וֹל <S%H1419><s%> For thou [art] great אַ֭תָּה <S%H859><s%> you וְעֹשֵׂ֣ה <S%H6213><s%> and doest נִפְלָא֑וֹת <S%H6381><s%> wondrous things אַתָּ֖ה <S%H859><s%> you אֱלֹהִ֣ים <S%H430><s%> thou [art] God לְבַדֶּֽךָ׃ <S%H905><s%> alone

ה֘וֹרֵ֤נִי <S%H3384><s%> Teach יְהוָ֨ה ׀ <S%H3068><s%> O LORD דַּרְכֶּ֗ךָ <S%H1870><s%> me thy way אֲהַלֵּ֥ךְ <S%H1980><s%> I will walk בַּאֲמִתֶּ֑ךָ <S%H571><s%> in thy truth יַחֵ֥ד <S%H3161><s%> unite לְ֝בָבִ֗י <S%H3824><s%> my heart לְיִרְאָ֥ה <S%H3372><s%> to fear שְׁמֶֽךָ׃ <S%H8034><s%> thy name

אוֹדְךָ֤ ׀ <S%H3034><s%> I will praise אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> thee O Lord אֱ֭לֹהַי <S%H430><s%> my God בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all לְבָבִ֑י <S%H3824><s%> with all my heart וַאֲכַבְּדָ֖ה <S%H3513><s%> and I will glorify שִׁמְךָ֣ <S%H8034><s%> thy name לְעוֹלָֽם׃ <S%H5769><s%> for evermore

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> For חַ֭סְדְּךָ <S%H2617><s%> [is] thy mercy גָּד֣וֹל <S%H1419><s%> For great עָלָ֑י <S%H5921><s%> toward וְהִצַּ֥לְתָּ <S%H5337><s%> toward me and thou hast delivered נַ֝פְשִׁ֗י <S%H5315><s%> my soul מִשְּׁא֥וֹל <S%H7585><s%> hell תַּחְתִּיָּֽה׃ <S%H8482><s%> from the lowest

אֱלֹהִ֤ים ׀ <S%H430><s%> O God זֵ֘דִ֤ים <S%H2086><s%> the proud קָֽמוּ־ <S%H6965><s%> are risen עָלַ֗י <S%H5921><s%> against וַעֲדַ֣ת <S%H5712><s%> against me and the assemblies עָ֭רִיצִים <S%H6184><s%> of violent בִּקְשׁ֣וּ <S%H1245><s%> [men] have sought נַפְשִׁ֑י <S%H5315><s%> after my soul וְלֹ֖א <S%H3808><s%> have not שָׂמ֣וּךָ <S%H7760><s%> and have not set לְנֶגְדָּֽם׃ <S%H5048><s%> before

וְאַתָּ֣ה <S%H859><s%> O אֲ֭דֹנָי <S%H136><s%> But thou O Lord אֵל־ <S%H410><s%> [art] a God רַח֣וּם <S%H7349><s%> full of compassion וְחַנּ֑וּן <S%H2587><s%> and gracious אֶ֥רֶךְ <S%H750><s%> Slow אַ֝פַּ֗יִם <S%H639><s%> to anger וְרַב־ <S%H7227><s%> and plenteous חֶ֥סֶד <S%H2617><s%> in mercy וֶאֱמֶֽת׃ <S%H571><s%> and truth

פְּנֵ֥ה <S%H6437><s%> O turn אֵלַ֗י <S%H413><s%> to me וְחָ֫נֵּ֥נִי <S%H2603><s%> unto me and have mercy תְּנָֽה־ <S%H5414><s%> upon me give עֻזְּךָ֥ <S%H5797><s%> thy strength לְעַבְדֶּ֑ךָ <S%H5650><s%> unto thy servant וְ֝הוֹשִׁ֗יעָה <S%H3467><s%> and save לְבֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son אֲמָתֶֽךָ׃ <S%H519><s%> of thine handmaid

עֲשֵֽׂה־ <S%H6213><s%> Shew עִמִּ֥י <S%H5973><s%> with א֗וֹת <S%H226><s%> me a token לְט֫וֹבָ֥ה <S%H2896><s%> for good וְיִרְא֣וּ <S%H7200><s%> me may see שֹׂנְאַ֣י <S%H8130><s%> that they which hate וְיֵבֹ֑שׁוּ <S%H954><s%> [it] and be ashamed כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> Because אַתָּ֥ה <S%H859><s%> O יְ֝הוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> because thou LORD עֲזַרְתַּ֥נִי <S%H5826><s%> hast holpen וְנִחַמְתָּֽנִי׃ <S%H5162><s%> me and comforted
